# ğŸ¯ Slash Command Demonstrations

This directory contains **actual code generated by slash commands** to demonstrate their power.

---

## ğŸ“ Demo Files

### 1. `optimized_easypost_service.py`
**Generated by**: `/optimize backend/src/services/easypost_service.py`  
**Time**: ~20 seconds  
**Shows**: M3 Max optimizations (32-40 workers, 32GB cache, 128GB RAM-aware)

### 2. `benchmark_parse_bulk_rates.py`
**Generated by**: `/bench parse_and_get_bulk_rates`  
**Time**: ~15 seconds  
**Shows**: Complete benchmark suite for 16-core M3 Max

### 3. `component_PerformanceMonitor.jsx`
**Generated by**: `/component PerformanceMonitor`  
**Time**: ~10 seconds  
**Shows**: React component with real-time monitoring

---

## ğŸš€ How to Use

### Run Optimized Service
```bash
cd demos
python optimized_easypost_service.py
# See M3 Max worker initialization
```

### Run Benchmark
```bash
cd demos  
python benchmark_parse_bulk_rates.py
# See actual 16-core performance!
```

### Use Component
```bash
# Copy to frontend
cp demos/component_PerformanceMonitor.jsx frontend/src/components/monitoring/
# Import and use in your app
```
